department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Introduction to MicroElectroMechanical System
course.faculty_text: Fawwaz Habbal and Peter RH Stark
course.description: This course introduces student to the rapidly emerging, multi-disciplinary and exciting field of MicroElectroMechanical Systems (MEMS). It teaches fundamentals of micro machining and Micro fabrication techniques, including planar thin-film process technologies, photolithography and soft-lithography techniques, deposition and etching techniques, and surface, bulk, and electroplating micro machining technologies.
course.prerequisites: Physics 11a,b or 15a,b; College Chemistry at the level of Life Sciences 1a and Physical Sciences 1.
